data.description:
Take a break at the beach! Your non-game getaway. 
The beach activates your parasympathetic nervous system inducing rest, recovery and well-being.

Take 5 | Reduce Stress | Be in the Moment | Breathe Deeply | Feel Better 

Install now to take advantage of Early Access pricing.

Early Access Benefits:

Solid app ready-to-use now.

12 Stunning Beaches: St. Barts, France, Sweden, Turks & Caicos, Mexico.

20 Gratitude Meditations: 4-6 minute sessions designed to uplift your spirit.

Beach Bag of Goodies:

10 music tracks
400 mantras
Volume controls
Timer and stopwatch
Inspirational quotes
Menu on/off anytime

Immerse yourself in custom 360° videos of breathtaking beaches. Feel like you’re truly there, experiencing the sights and sounds of a “real” beach from a stationary position, and bask in pure relaxation.

Exciting Features Coming Up:

Increased beach resolution

Location Mapping: Learn where you are on earth

Breath Animations: Visual cues to enhance your breathing exercises

Daily Praia: Randomizer delivering the beach, gratitude, music, and mantra meant for you today

Expanded Content:
More guides and meditations
ASMR, yoga, breath work, gratitude, sound healing
Additional music and short stories

Praia Beads: Hold them, they light up as you click through mantras/gratitudes/intentions.

Hand Control & Design
Interactions and enhanced design with crystals, beach stones, candles, and more.

Beaches
Installing and uninstalling individual beaches.

Upcoming Locations: Hawaii, Mexico, Canada, Indonesia, Greece.
